A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Probably a fine movie for the new\, younger fan.  But for a traditionalist who saw Empire back when it was in theaters\, this movie was a colossal disappointment.  Especially considering the excitement many of us held leading up to the release.  But in all\, this movie all but affirms there really isn't any REAL Star Wars movie w/o George Lucas' involvement.  But nonetheless\, just quite sad to see the legacy take this turn.
